channel.title: Bipolar Artist on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Bipolar Artist on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Creating Change
item.description: Creating Change Creating change is something that’s always at the forefront of our minds, whether it be helping a client rebrand from scratch or encouraging team members to stretch themselves with a new language. Client time A fresh image Giving a brand a funky fresh new image is always exciting.

item.title: Creating Change
item.description: Creating Emotions Every time we start a project we ask ourselves, how do we want people to feel? Making something look pretty is one thing, but we want to rock your world. Client time A Joyous Republic A disruptive UK mobile network was looking for a way to take employee engagement to the next level.

item.title: Creating Change
item.description: Embracing Change The early days were all about print projects like brochures, flyers and posters. Then the world changed and now our days whizz by working on websites, digital designs and other online adventures. Client time Excitement control We don’t make changes for the sake of it so we carried out a complete SEO audit of the Sky Spain site before proposing any amendments.

item.title: Creating Change
item.description: Embracing Change The early days were all about print projects like brochures, flyers and posters. Then the world changed and now our days whizz by working on websites, digital designs and other online adventures. Client time Excitement control We don’t make changes for the sake of it so we carried out a complete SEO audit of the Sky Spain site before proposing any amendments.

item.title: Creating Change
item.description: Inspiring Change Change can start with an idea, a sketch, a conversation or a brainstorm in a coffee shop. We don’t know how it happens we’re just experts at making sure it does. Client time Social glitter Reaching a very large audience is never easy, but we're experts at taking brands to the next level.

item.title: Creating Change
item.description: Inspiring Emotions We pour everything into our designs and want to inspire a range of emotions in people so they don’t just go “oh” but “aw” as well. -- Motion Animating folks with animation We love a challenge. Like getting customers excited about a client’s new financial service in a fun and friendly way.
